A ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019, an bayyana ƙungiyar cututtuka na pneumonia na ƙarshe da aikace-aikacen aetiology a Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana jani ne a matsayin kwayar cutar da ake kira severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
A cikin wannan lokacin, cutar da ke fitarwa daga cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance an yi la'akari da ita a matsayin cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).
Bayanai da yanzu ya nuna cewa ca 80% na mutanen da suke cutar COVID-19 suna da cutar mala'ika, i.e. cuta ta hanyoyin zaɓaɓɓu tare da ko da aƙalla pneumonia, kuma akwai ƙarin waɗannan suka dawo.
A cikin 14% na lokutan, COVID-19 ya zama cikakken cutar da ke buƙatar kulawa a cibiyar sadarwa, yayin da 6% na lokutan ke da cutar da ke buƙatar kulawa mai girma.
Matsakaicin mutanen da suka shiga cikin COVID-19 a cikin asibiti suna mutuwa ne kusan 4%.

A ranar 11 ga Maris 2020, Shugaban Kasa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (WHO) ya tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya zama pandemiyar.
A cikin jaridar Eurosurveillance na 5 ga watan Maris 2020, Spiteri da sauransu suka bayyana a cikin jaridar 2020 na COVID-19 na farko a cikin Turai da aka tabbatar da shi ta hanyar bayyana WHO.
A cikin EU/EEA, na farko biyu na tabbatarwa sun bayyana a Faransa a ranar 24 ga watan Janairu 2020 a cikin mutanen da suka dawo daga Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020, COVID-19 an gano shi a duk ƙasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya (UK), inda daga 31 ga Disamba 2019 zuwa wannan ranar, an bayyana 39,768 kaso da 1,727 mutuwa, tare da 17,750 kaso da 1,441 mutuwa daga Italiya kawai.

A cikin European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), bayanan COVID-19 da aka bayyana a kowace ƙasa a duniya, da aka samu daga kawai sassan hukumomin jama'a na ƙasashen da ke da alhakin su kamar Hukumar Lafiya ta Ƙasashen Duniya, hukumomin lafiya na ƙasashen da ke da alhakin su da kuma ECDC, ana ƙara su kowace rana a 8:00 a.m.
An yi amfani da wannan bayanin don ayyana haɓakar COVID-19 a cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, kuma suka yi kiyayewa da shi a Italiya.

Gyaran tsarin nazarin COVID-19 “karin bayanai” da “karin bayanai” zai yiwu

A ranar 6 ga watan Fabrairu 2020, tawarar mu ta buga shawarwarin harkokin shari'ar da ke da alaƙa da cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) da kuma wannan shawarwarin ta bayyana nasarar mu da kuma zama mai amfani ga yakin da ke da alaƙa da wannan cutar a duniya.

Amma cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) ita ce cutar da ta fara faruwa, yadda muka samu sanin da kuma shawarar muka samu suna ci gaba a cikin bincike da aikace-aikacen aikin likita; don haka, ayyukan nazarin da kuma aikace-aikacen ilimin likita suna ci gaba.

A cikin wannan rahoton, muka jawabi ga wani bayanin da aka yi a kan hujjar mu da kuma bayar da sabbin manufofin bayyana "wani abu mai tsanani" da "wanda aka tabbatar" kuma kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin Hujjorin Bayar da Maganin COVID-19 (hujjar 7) da aka bayar da shi ta Majalisar Lafiya ta Jamhuriyar Jama'ar China.

A cikin Disamba 2019, cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) ta haifar da cutar, wacce a yanzu an san ta a matsayin cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) kuma cutar ta kasance an san ta a matsayin severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, WHO ya bayyana COVID-19 a matsayin pandemiyar.
A cikin yin yaki da cutar SARS-CoV-2, tawararmu ta haɓaka tushen shawara mai tsawon lokaci kuma an buga shi online a cikin Ayyukan Kimiyyar Soja a ranar 06 ga Fabrairu 2020.
Ƙirƙirar ya samar da kyakkyawan sha'awa tun daga an buga shi.

Kamar yadda, COVID-19 babban abu ne, yadda muna sanin da kuma shawarar muna ci gaba da karɓarwa ta hanyoyin binciken da ake yi da aikace-aikacen aikin likita; don haka, hanyoyin nazarin da aikin likita suna ci gaba da canzawa.

Bangladesh ta bayyana cewa an kashe mutane biyu a cikin ɗan gajeren lokaci saboda COVID-19, mafi girma a rana
A cikin yau, Bangladesh ya tabbatar da mutane biyu da suka mutu sakamakon COVID-19 a ranar.
Wannan ita ce mafi yawan mutanen da suka mutu a rana daya ne saboda cutar.

A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladeshi Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) ya bayyana cewa, yawan masu cutarwa da aka kiyasta sun hada da 114 masu cutarwa masu aiki da kuma 33 masu cutarwa masu tsira da ke zaune a gida.

Kowane lafiya na cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta farko ke faruwa a cikin cututtukan koronavirus na gani. A cikin jikin mutum, cutar ta kashe. A cikin gida, cutar ta kashe ta hanyar shanuwa, wanda ke kawo ƙarancin ƙarfe mai kare shi. SARS-CoV-2 ta dogara da SARS-CoV na farko.
An yi imanin cewa ya samo asali ne daga zoonosis.

Ita ce 96% ta yi daidaituwa a cikin genome na bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).

Akwai tsirrai da yawa game da wani ƙarshe na farko (wanda aka sani da "matariki na farko") ya samo asali.
Ƙimar farko da aka sani na cutar coronavirus ta farko ta iya ƙayyade zuwa 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan, Hubei, China.
A cikin wata, yawan cutar coronavirus a Hubei ya karu cikin tsari.

Wadannan suna da alaƙa sosai da kasuwancin Huanan Seafood, wanda kuma ya sayar da dabbobi masu rayuwa, kuma ƙa'idar ɗaya ita ce cewa cutar ta fito ne daga ɗaya daga cikin abubuwan da suka shafi dabbobi; ko kuma, a cikin saƙon da ke da alaƙa da dabbobi.
A ranar 30 ga Disamba, ƙungiyar ɗalibai a ƙaramar hukumar Wuhan Central Hospital suka bayyana ga abokan aikinsu cewa "coronavirus na SARS".

Aƙalla bakwai daga cikin doctarsu, ciki har da Li Wenliang, an yi watsi da su ta hanyar jami’an siyasa don tayar da labarai masu son rana, kuma ɗayan, Ai Fen, an yi watsi da shi daga cikin shugabanninsa don tayar da alamun.
Hukumar Lafiya ta Gwamnatin Wuhan ta fitar da bayanin jama'a a ranar 31 Disamba kuma ta bayyana ga WHO.
A cikin lokutan farko na cutar, adadin cututtukan da ba a san su ba ya ƙara a kowace rana kusan 7.5.

A farkon da tsakanin watan Janairu na 2020, cutar ta fasa zuwa yankuna sauran jihar Sin, tare da taimakon tashin hankali na Shekara ta Sin da kuma Wuhan da ke cikin matsakaicin tashar jirgin ƙasa da ƙarƙashin tashar jirgin ƙasa.
A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, kasar Sin ta bayyana kusan 140 mutane da suka samu hatsari a rana daya, ciki har da mutane biyu a Beijing da ɗaya a Shenzhen.

Bayanin hukuma da aka tabbatar da shi ya nuna cewa a ranar 20 ga watan Janairu 2020, 6,174 mutane suna da alamun cutar. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, Amurka ta yi nasara a kan China da Italiya da kuma mafi girman yawan cututtukan da aka tabbatar da su a duniya. A ranar 9 ga watan Afrilu 2020, akwai kimanin mutane 1.61 miliyan da aka tabbatar da su a duniya; akwai kimanin mutane 97,000 da suka mutu da kuma kimanin mutane 364,000 da suka samu nasarar tsira.
Kashi 200 na kasashen duniya da kuma yankuna suna da ɗaya ko fiye na cutar.
Saboda cutar ta COVID-19 a Turai, ƙasashe da yawa a cikin yankin Schengen sun kiyaye ayyukan da suka dace da kuma suka ƙirƙiri tsayayyun iyaka.

Ƙungiyoyin ƙasa sun haɗa da ayyukan ƙuntatawa kamar karantawa (wanda aka sani da hukuncin zama a gida, hukuncin zama a cikin gida, ko lockdown) da hukuncin lokaci. A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilu, kusan 300 miliyan mutane, ko kusan kashi 90% na yawan jama'a, suna cikin karantawa a Amurka, kusan 50 miliyan mutane suna cikin karantawa a Filipin, kusan 59 miliyan mutane suna cikin karantawa a Afirka ta Kudu, da 1.3 miliyan mutane suna cikin karantawa a Indiya.

A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, 1.7 al'ummomi a duniya suna cikin ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan ƙaƙƙarfan
Wannan lokacin da aka tabbatar da COVID-19 ya fara ne a ranar 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan; wani rahoton da ba a tabbatar ba ya nuna cewa lokacin farko ya fara ne a ranar 17 Nuwamba.
Dr. Zhang Jixian ya gamsu ƙungiyar cututtukan pneumonia da ba a san daidai da shi a ranar 26 Disamba, bayan haka aikace-aikacen gidan yari ya yi bayani ga Wuhan Jianghan CDC a ranar 27 Disamba.
Tasirin farko na nazarin kwayoyin halitta na nufin cewa akwai kwayoyin halitta masu alaƙa da SARS.
An sanarwa ta jama'a ta fito daga Hukumar Lafiya ta Wuhan a ranar 31 Disamba.
An yi bayani ga Majalisar Dinkin Duniya a wannan ranar.
A wannan lokacin, likitoci a Wuhan an yi watsa da jami’an siyasa don "yin bayani" game da cutar da ta faru.
Hukumar lafiya ta kasar Sin ta shigar da shawarar cewa ba a samu "babban bayani" game da haɗaɗɗen mutane zuwa mutane.

A cikin watan Janairu na ƙarshe, gwamnatin Sin ta shigar da yakin neman zabe na ƙarshe bayan haka an bayyana shi a matsayin "yaki na ƙasa" ta shugaban jam'iyyar gwamnati Xi Jinping don tabbatar da cewa ba zai iya ƙara.

A cikin wani lokacin da aka yi imanin cewa "matsala mafi girma a cikin tarihin jama'a", an sanar da cordon sanitaire a ranar 23 ga watan Janairu don tabbatar da cewa ba za a iya yin tafiya zuwa da daga Wuhan ba, wanda aka ƙara zuwa jimillar 15 birane a Hubei, wanda ya haifar da jimillar kusan 57 miliyan mutane.
Amfani da motocin kuɗi na sirri an hana a birnin.
Bugun Shekarar Sin (25 ga Janairu) an cire shi daga cikin wuraren da yawa.
Hukumomin kuma sun bayyana cewa ake gina asibitin da ake kira Asibitin Huoshenshan, wanda aka kammala a cikin 10 rana.
Bayan haka, wani asibiti kuma aka gina, Leishenshan Asibiti, don ajiye masu cutarwa.

A cikin wannan lokacin, kasar China kuma ta canza 14 cibiyoyi da aka yi amfani da su a Wuhan, ciki har da wuraren taro da filin wasa, zuwa cibiyoyi masu amfani na tsawon lokaci. A ranar 26 ga watan Janairu, gwamnatin kasar ta yi amfani da hanyoyi masu amfani don tabbatar da cire cutar COVID-19, ciki har da bayar da bayanai na lafiya ga mutanen da suka shigo da kasar.
Kungiyoyin jami'o'i da makarantu a ƙasashen da suka cika kuma an soke su.
Yankuna na Hong Kong da Macau suka shigar da sabbin ayyuka, musamman a cikin ilimi da jami'o'i.
Ayyukan aiki daga waje an shigar da su a yankunan da dama a Sin.
An shigar da hanyoyin cin zarce a cikin da kusa da Hubei.
Yanayin jirgin kasa ya ƙayyade, da kuma cibiyoyin tarihi a duk faɗin kasar China suka kasance suna tsarewa.

A cikin birane da yawa, ana amfani da tsari na jama'a, kuma an ƙididdige cewa kusan 760 miliyan mutane (kashi kashi kashi ɗaya na yawan jama'a) sun yi amfani da tsari na waje. Iran ta bayyana aikace-aikacenta na farko na cutar SARS-CoV-2 a ranar 19 ga watan Fabrairu a Qom, inda, kamar yadda ma'aikatar lafiya da ilimin lafiya ta bayyana, mutane biyu sun mutu a wannan rana.

Ayyukan farko da gwamnati ta bayyana sun hada da dakatar da wasannin kwaikwayo da ayyukan al'adu, wasannin wasa, da ayyukan addini na Juma'a, da kuma dakatar da makarantu, makarantun karatun jami'a, da makarantu.
Iran ya ba da rikodin guda biyar na riyali don yaki da cutar.
Shugaba Hassan Rouhani ya ce a ranar 26 ga watan Fabrairu 2020 cewa ba a cikin shawarwari don karewa yanki da ke cikin cutar, kuma kawai mutane ne za su karewa.
A cikin Maris, an sanar da shawarwarin kafa hanyoyi tsakanin biranen, amma yawan kewayawa tsakanin biranen a cikin watan Maris kafin Nowruz ya ci gaba.

A ranar 15 ga watan Maris, gwamnatin Iran ta bayyana cewa mutane 100 suka mutu a ranar ɗaya, mafi kyawun da aka samu a ƙasar daga lokacin da aka fara yaduwa.
A kashi 12 na siyasa da malamai na Iran da ke zaune ko da ke zaune sun mutu daga cutar ta 17 ga Maris.
A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, Iran ta yi nasarar samun ƙimar 50 a kowace sa'o'i da ƙimar mutuwa ɗaya a kowace rabin mintuna sakamakon coronavirus.
Kamar yadda shugaban WHO ya bayyana, zai iya yiwuwa akwai matsakaicin biyu da yawa a Iran ba shi da daidaitaccen bayyana.
Kuma ana bayyana cewa ayyukan kashe-kashen Amurka kan kasar Iran zai iya yiwuwa aikin kasuwancin kasar Iran ya shafi damar kasar ta cikin kuɗi don yin maganin cutar.
Shugaban kula da haƙƙin ɗan adam na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ya buƙaci takunkumin kasuwanci su ƙare ga ƙasashe masu tasiri mafi girma na cutar, ciki har da Iran.
Babban cutar ta fito a Italiya a ranar 31 ga watan Janairu, lokacin da mutane biyu daga kasar Sin suka samu cutar a Rome.
Ayyuka suka fara karuwa sosai, wanda ya sa gwamnatin Italiya ta aika motocin jirgin sama zuwa da daga China da kuma tabbatar da matsin lamba.

A cikin watan Fabrairu na shekara ta 2020, an tabbatar da cewa cutar COVID-19 ta shiga Italiya. A ranar 21 ga Fabrairu, an tabbatar da cewa an gano ƙungiyar COVID-19 ta farko a Italiya, wanda ya fara da 16 mutane a Lombardy. A ranar 22 ga Fabrairu, Majalisar Ministocin Italiya ta sanar da dokar jama'a ta hanyar tabbatar da cewa za a yi amfani da kwanan wata 50,000 a cikin 11 garuruwa a arewacin Italiya don tabbatar da cewa za a yi amfani da kwanan wata 50,000 a cikin 11 garuruwa a arewacin Italiya don tabbatar da cewa za a yi amfani da kwanan wata 50,000 a cikin 11 garuruwa a arewacin Italiya don tabbatar da cewa za a yi amfani da kwanan wata 50,000 a cikin 11 garuruwa a arewacin Italiya don tabbatar da cewa za a yi amfani da kwanan wata 50,000 a cikin 11 garuruwa a arewacin Italiya don tabbatar da cewa za a yi amfani da kwanan wata 50,000 a cikin 11 garuruwa a arewacin Italiya don tabbatar da cewa za a yi amfani da kwanan wata 50,000 a cikin 11 garuruwa a arewacin
Shugaban gwamnatin Giuseppe Conte ya ce, "A wuraren zazzagewa, shigarwa da fitarwa ba za a ba da shi ba.

Ayyukan aiki da ayyukan wasanni suna cikin tsari a wannan yanki."A ranar 4 ga watan Maris, gwamnatin Italiya ta umarci kowane makaranta da jami'o'i a duk fadin kasar a lokacin da Italiya ta samu 100 mutuwa.
Ayyukan wasanni na musamman, ciki har da wasannin kwallon kafa na Serie A, za su kasance a cikin gida har zuwa watan Afrilu, amma a ranar 9 ga Maris, duk wasanni ya ƙare ne har zuwa wata ɗaya.

A ranar 11 ga watan Maris, Firayim Minista Conte ya yi umarni da a aika wajen aikin kasuwanci har ma da kasuwanci da dukiyoyi. A ranar 6 ga watan Maris, SIAARTI na Italiya ya buga umarni na siyasa na lafiya game da ayyukan triage da za a iya amfani da su.
A ranar 19 ga watan Maris, Italiya ta yi nasara a kan China a matsayin ƙasar da ke da mafi yawan mutanen da suka mutu sakamakon cutar coronavirus a duniya bayan ta bayyana 3,405 mutuwa daga cutar.
A ranar 22 ga watan Maris, an ruwaito cewa Rasha ta ƙirƙiri tara motocin sojoji da kayayyakin lissafi zuwa Italiya.
A ranar 5 ga watan Afrilu, akwai 128,948 ƙara, 15,887 mutuwa, da 21,815 ƙara a Italiya, tare da kashi mafi girma na wannan ƙara a yankin Lombardy.
Rahoton CNN ya nuna cewa yawan jama'a masu shekaru da dama a Italiya da rashin daidaita kowane wanda yana da cutar ta yanzu zai iya yin nasarar daidaita matsakaicin mutuwa.

Ƙungiyar ƙasa ta Birtaniya ta jawo hankalin cutar ta farko a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin ƙasashen da suka shafi, kuma har zuwa ranar 18 ga Maris 2020, gwamnatin Burtaniya ba ta yi amfani da hanyoyin kiyayewa ko masu ƙaura a cikin jama'arta.

A ranar 20 ga watan Maris, gwamnati ta bayyana cewa duk wuraren ajiya da suka hada da pub da gyms za su yi nasarar kammala kafin lokaci, kuma ta yi alkawarin bayar da kashi 80% na kuɗin aikin masu aiki zuwa matsakaicin £ 2,500 a kowace wata don hana aikatawa a cikin matsalar. A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, Shugaban kasa ya bayyana matsayin karkara na juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna da juna
Ba kamar ayyukan da suka gabata ba, ayyukan da aka yi an iya amfani da su ne ta hanyar samun kuɗi da ƙungiyoyin haɗin gwiwa.

Ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da yawa an umarci su yi ƙarshe, tare da izini don ƙungiyoyin da aka ɗauka a matsayin "muhimmanci", ciki har da kasuwancin kasuwanci, kasuwancin magani, bankuna, kasuwancin kayayyakin more rayuwa, kasuwancin man fetur, da garajen mota.
A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, an tabbatar da wani kaso na farko na COVID-19 a cikin yankin Pacific Northwest na jihar Washington a cikin wani dan adam da ya koma Wuhan ranar 15 ga watan Janairu.
Kungiyar aikin tsaro ta Coronavirus ta White House ta kasance a ranar 29 ga watan Janairu.
A ranar 31 ga watan Janairu, gwamnatin Trump ta bayyana matsalar lafiya ta jama'a, kuma ta tsara iyaka kan shiga ga masu zuwa daga China.
A ranar 28 ga watan Janairu 2020, Center for Disease Control—kungiyar lafiyar jama'a mafi girma na gwamnatin Amurka—ta bayyana cewa suka yi nasarar samun kitin da za su yi imanin.
Ba da daɗewa ba, ƙasar Amurka ta yi ƙasa a cikin ƙwarewa, wanda ya ƙuntata ƙimar ƙarshe na cutar a lokacin.

Bincike ya yi nasara ne a cikin kitse na bincike da ke cikin kuskure da aka shirya daga gwamnatin tarayya a watan Fabrairu, kuskure da gwamnatin tarayya ba ta amincewa da kitse na bincike da aka shirya daga makarantu, kamfanoni da asibitai har zuwa kusan watan Fabrairu, da manufar da ba za a iya amfani da ita ba har zuwa farkon watan Maris (ba za a iya amfani da ita ba har zuwa kwanan wata).
A ranar 27 ga watan Fabrairu, The Washington Post ya bayyana cewa akwai kusan 4,000 aikin test a Amurka.
A ranar 13 ga watan Maris, The Atlantic ya ruwaito cewa kawai kashi 14,000 ana gudanar da testa.

A ranar 22 ga watan Maris, Associated Press ya bayyana: "Kimanin mutane da suka samu alamun da umarnin lauya sun yi waiki ko rana da rana don aikin test."Bayan mutuwar farko a Amurka ta bayyana a jihar Washington a ranar 29 ga watan Fabrairu, Gwamnan Jay Inslee ya bayyana matsin lamba, wanda ya yi nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar yin nasarar y

Akwai makarantu a yankin Seattle da suka yi nasara a ranar 3 ga watan Maris, kuma a karshe, makarantu a kasar da suka yi nasara a cikin watan Maris. A ranar 6 ga watan Maris 2020, Amurka an ba da shawarar bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayyana bayy

A wannan ranar shugaban kasa Trump ya sanya Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, wanda ya ba da $8.3 biliyan a cikin kuɗi mai zaman kanta don hukumomin tarayya su yi watsi da cutar.
Kungiyoyi suka kiyaye haɗaɗɗen aiki, suka dakatar da tarurruka, da kuma suka ɗauki ɗalibai su aiki daga gida.
Ayyukan wasanni da lokuta suna cire. A ranar 11 ga watan Maris, Trump ya bayyana iyakar tafiye-tafiye ga yawancin Turai, ciki har da Burtaniya, don rana 30, a ranar 13 ga watan Maris.
A ranar da ta biyo bayan wannan, ya ƙara iyakar da suka haɗa ƙasar Birtaniya da Irland.
A ranar 13 ga watan Maris, ya bayyana matsalar kasa, wanda ya sa kuɗin ƙasa ya kasance mai ɗaya don amsa matsalar.
A ranar 15 ga watan Maris, akwai manyan kamfanoni da suka yi nasara ko kuma suka kawo sa'o'i da yawa a cikin Amurka don tabbatar da cewa za a ƙara yin watsi da cutar.

A ranar 17 ga watan Maris, cutar ta kasance an tabbatar da cewa ta kasance a cikin jihar 50 kuma a cikin District of Columbia. A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, an bayyana cewa birnin New York yana da 10,700 kaso na cutar coronavirus, da yawa da jimillar kaso da ke cikin South Korea.
A ranar 25 ga watan Maris, gwamnan ya ce cewa rarrabuwar jama'a ya kasance yana aiki, saboda ayyukan dubawa na ƙara ya ƙare daga 2.0 rana zuwa 4.7 rana.

A ranar 28 ga watan Maris, akwai 32,308 amsoshi da ake tabbatarwa a birnin New York, kuma 672 mutane sun mutu ne daga cutar virus. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, Amurka an tabbatar da cewa ya samu amsoshi da yawa na cutar coronavirus a duniya, ciki har da China da Italiya. A ranar 8 ga watan Afrilu, akwai 400,335 amsoshi da ake tabbatarwa a Amurka, kuma 12,841 mutane sun mutu.
A ranar 30 ga watan Maris, an bayyana cewa shugaban kasar Amurka Donald Trump ya yanke shawarar ci gaba da ayyukan jirgin kasa har zuwa ranar 30 ga watan Afrilu.
A wannan ranar, USNS Comfort, jirgin kasuwanci da ke da kusan 1000 coci, ya shiga New York.
A ranar 3 ga watan Afrilu, Amurka ta samu mafi kyawun mutuwar 884 daga cutar coronavirus a cikin 24 na lokaci.

A cikin jihar New York, kasuwannin sun kai ƙasa da 100,000 mutane a ranar 3 ga watan Afrilu. Ofishin Shugaban Ƙasa ya kasance an yi la'akari da shi saboda yin la'akari da matsalar da kuma sarrafa bayyanar da bayanai ta hanyar amincewa da shugaban gudanarwa Mike Pence.
Ƙididdiga mai ƙarfi na ƙungiyoyin siyasa kan shawarar Trump kan matsalolin da ya shafi shi ya ƙunshi ƙungiyoyin siyasa.

Anan daidaitaccen bincike kan alamun nishaɗi ya kasance ana amfani da shi don ƙirƙirar da ƙididdige alamun yada da aka buga a cikin The Journal of Travel Medicine a tsakiyar Janairu 2020.
A cikin bayanan shekarar 2018 daga International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, da Taipei suna da mafi girman mutanen da ke zuwa Wuhan.
Dubai, Sydney, da Melbourne kuma an bayyana su a matsayin wuraren da ke da yawa a cikin mutanen da suka shiga daga Wuhan.

Bali ya kasance mafi ƙarancin ƙwarewa a cikin ƙungiyoyin 20 mafi ƙima a cikin ƙwarewa, yayin da biranen a Ostiraliya suka kasance mafi ƙwarewa.Australia ta ƙaddamar da Ƙa'idar Yanayin Ƙarshe don Cutar Coronavirus (COVID-19) a ranar 7 ga Fabrairu.
Ita ta bayyana cewa akwai yawa da ake buƙatar tabbatar da shi game da COVID-19, da kuma cewa Australia za ta nuna ikon kare iyaka da sadarwa a cikinsa a cikin jawabinsa ga cutar.
A ranar 21 ga watan Maris, an tabbatar da cewa yaƙin da aka yi a ƙarƙashin ƙasa ya faru a Ostiraliya.

Ko da yake aikin karantawa da ake gudanarwa a Wuhan da Hubei ya fi dacewa, akwai wasu kasashen da suka shirya cire jama'a da kuma kungiyoyi masu shugabanci daga yankin, galibi ta hanyoyin jirgin da ake kira da chartered flights, tare da hukumomin kasar China suka ba da izini.
Canada, Amurka, Japan, Indiya, Sri Lanka, Australia, Faransa, Argentina, Jamus, da Thailand su ne masu farko da suka shirya tafiyar da mutaninsu.
Pakistan ya ce ba zai yi kiyaye kowane mutane daga China ba.
A ranar 7 ga watan Fabrairu, Brazil ta tare da 34 Brazilians ko dangin su, tare da Poles hudu, mutum ɗaya na China, da mutum ɗaya na Indiya.
Jama'ar Poland, China, da Indiya sun shigo Poland, inda motar Brazil ta yi rikodin kafin ta ci gaba da hanyarta zuwa Brazil.
Mataimakin shugabannin Brazil da suka tafi Wuhan suna cikin karantawa a cikin filin soji a kusa da Brasília.
A wannan ranar, 215 Kanadanci (176 daga jirgin farko, da kuma 39 daga jirgin biyu wanda gwamnatin Amurka ta shirya) sun fito daga Wuhan zuwa CFB Trenton don yin karantawa na makonni biyu.
A ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu, ƙungiyar jiragen sama ta 185 daga Wuhan ta zuwa CFB Trenton.

Hukumomin Australiya suka kare 277 mutane a ranakun 3 da 4 ga watan Fabrairu zuwa wurin karewa na Christmas Island Detention Centre, wanda aka sake amfani da shi a matsayin wurin karantawa, inda suka zama na kwanaki 14.

Ƙungiyar ƙirƙirar New Zealand ta shiga Auckland a ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu; mutanen da suka shiga (wanda suka hada da wasu daga Ostiraliya da Kudancin Pasifik) sun kasance a cikin karantawa a cibiyar jirgin ruwa a Whangaparoa, kudu maso yammacin Auckland.
A ranar 15 ga watan Fabrairu, kasar Amurka ta bayyana cewa za ta kwashe Amurkawa da ke cikin motar kaya Diamond Princess.
A ranar 21 ga watan Fabrairu, jirgin da ke dauke da mutane 129 na Kanada da suka shigo daga Diamond Princess ya isa Trenton, Ontario.

A farkon Maris, gwamnatin Indiya ta fara dawowa masu zaman kansu daga Iran. A ranar 14 ga Maris, jirgin sama na South African Airways da aka ajiye ta gwamnatin Afirka ta Kudu ta dawowa 112 masu zaman kansu na Afirka ta Kudu.

An gudanar da bincike na lafiya kafin shirye-shirye, da kuma mutane hudu daga kasar Afirka ta Kudu da ke nuna alamun koronavirus suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu suna cikin jikinsu
Kawai mutanen Afirka ta Kudu da suka tabbatar da cewa ba su da cutar ce suka dawo.

Bayyanar da sakamakon zane-zane ya dawo da duk mutanen Afirka ta Kudu, ciki har da kungiyar jirgin sama, jirgin sama, ma'aikatan gidan yari, jami'an tsaro da sojojin da suka shiga aikin kare rayuwa wadanda, a matsayin wani abu na tsari, duk suka ci gaba da nazarin da kuma karewa a gidan yari na The Ranch Resort na tsawon 14 rana.
A ranar 20 ga watan Maris, Amurka ta fara ƙarƙashin sojojin ta daga Iraq saboda cutar.

A ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu, Bill da Melinda Gates sun bayyana cewa sun ba da kuɗi na dalar Amurka miliyan 100 zuwa WHO don tallafawa aikin bincike da maganin cutar da ke faruwa da kuma kare "al'ummomin da ke cikin cutar" a Afirka da Asiya ta Kudu.

Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes. Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam. Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.

Bayan fitowar COVID-19 na farko, ayyuka da kuma labaran da kuma labarai da aka yi da suka shafi asalin, yawan, hanyoyin cin zarafin, ilimin da sauran abubuwa da ke da alaka da cutar da aka yi da su da kuma suka fito cikin tsananin tsari.
Mutane suna da damar yin watsa cutar zuwa wasu dabbobi.
Babu tabbacin da ake samu na viral replication a cikin pig, ducks, da chickens.
Babu abubuwan maganin ko maganin da aka amince da shi don yin maganin cutar.
Ayyukan karatun duniya kan cututtukan da ake amfani da su da magungunan COVID-19 suka fara ne ta hanyar ƙungiyoyin gwamnati, ƙungiyoyin karatun jami'a da masu karatun kasuwanci.
A cikin Maris, Majalisar Lafiya ta Duniya ta fara aikin "SOLIDARITY Trial" don yin bayyana tasirin maganin hudu da ake amfani da su na yanzu, wadanda ke da kyakkyawar tasiri.
Ba a samu wani vaccine ba, amma kungiyoyin da dama suna ci gaba da haɓaka wadannan vaccine.
An yi amfani da aikin da aka yi na SARS-CoV saboda SARS-CoV da SARS-CoV-2 suna amfani da ACE2 receptor don shiga cikin mutane.
Yanzu akwai sassan dabaru biyu da ke aiki.
Na farko, masu bincike suna da niyyar samar da cutar ta kai tsaye.

Vaccine daga cikin dabarun da suka gabata zai wuce zanga-zangar kula da lafiya da kyakkyawar aiki. A ranar 16 ga watan Maris 2020, an fara zanga-zangar kula da lafiya na farko na vaccine tare da mutane hudu a Seattle.

Vaccine ya ƙunshi wani koda genetik mai tsanani daga cutar da ke da alaƙa da cutar. Ayyukan da suka shafi haɓakawa na cutar da ke da alaƙa da SARS-COV-2 suna da alaƙa da haɓakawa, amma wannan yana da alaƙa.
Yana da fiye da 300 ayyuka masu aiki a matsayin a watan Afrilu 2020.
Ayyuka bakwai suka ba da rahoton ayyukan da aka amince da su don cutar malaria, ciki har da ayyukan hudu kan hydroxychloroquine ko chloroquine.

Akwai wasu abubuwan maganin da ake amfani da su don maganin COVID-19, ciki har da remdesivir, chloroquine da hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir da lopinavir/ritonavir tare da interferon beta.
Yana da abun da ya dace don faruwa ta hanyar remdesivir, a ranar Maris 2020.
Gyaran kula ya nuna a cikin masu yanke hukunci da aka yi amfani da remdesivir.

Amma akwai tambayoyi da kuma kira don a yi bincike kan aikin bincike.
Hukumar lafiya ta Koriya da China ta tabbatar da amfani da chloroquine.
